Entries.default: "Of all the holes I've seen, this is one of them."
"Let's not stand too close to that."
"Ain't exactly a hole in the wall, is it? On, well, account of it being a hole in the floor. Never mind."
"It's nice. Far as holes in the ground go, I reckon."
"You think the hole was already here, or they dug it after they thought up the name?"
"I'm starting to miss the gruel in Gilded Vale."
"Remaro ain't never brought me down here. Gods, I miss that man."
"Never smelled meat like that before. All half-rotten and... briny?"
"What would you call the color on that meat? Ash?"
